discussion.title: Seeking Methods to Track Loss, Complexity, and Score in PySR Iterations Without Custom SymbolicRegression.jl
discussion.body: I am using PySR for symbolic regression and need a simpler way to log loss, complexity, and score per iteration without customizing SymbolicRegression.jl. Does anyone have a generalized approach or suggestions for this?

nodes.body:
You can use this strategy: https://github.com/MilesCranmer/PySR/discussions/439#discussioncomment-7330778. But I would actually use more populations, and maybe 2 iterations per run so that migration happens.

And then when I finally finish adding TensorBoard, that would be even easier: https://github.com/MilesCranmer/SymbolicRegression.jl/pull/277

Also see progress on a UI in https://github.com/MilesCranmer/PySR/pull/589
